definition: out of order (of machine)/not working properly/a failing (of a system)

sentences.english: My car brakes went out on me when I was driving.
sentences.chinese: 我的車子在我開的時候煞車失靈了。

sentences.english: Insurance industry characteristics lead to market failure in managing sales expenses.
sentences.chinese: 保險行業的獨特性構成銷售費用市場失靈。

sentences.english: The main reason that caused the accident of this plane was a malfunction of the elevator.
sentences.chinese: 這架直升飛機失事的主要原因是升降舵失靈。
某物剛剛使系統失靈了。

sentences.english: Vacuum breakers fail supposing that leaks permit air to enter the interrupting chamber.
sentences.chinese: 假如空氣通過裂痕進入滅弧室，真空斷路器就失靈。

sentences.english: A motorcycle had crashed into a building because its brakes were broken.
sentences.chinese: 一輛摩托車因爲剎車失靈撞進了一棟建築。

sentences.english: He has just installed a safety device for his car in case of break failure.
sentences.chinese: 他的車剛裝了預防剎車失靈的保險裝置。

sentences.english: John lost control of the car and crashed into a shop.
sentences.chinese: 約翰的汽車失靈了，撞進一家商店。

sentences.english: The brake fail and the car come to a stop against a wall.
sentences.chinese: 他的車剛裝了預防剎車失靈的保險裝置。

sentences.english: Please report any hot water leaks or incorrectly functioning utilities you may observe.
sentences.chinese: 水暖設備漏水或其它設備失靈，請報修。

sentences.english: This is China Harmonious number train making force signal failure causes.
sentences.chinese: 這就是中國動車裝逼信號失靈的原因。

sentences.english: Positive externalities of public benefit forest lead to "the malfunction of the market".
sentences.chinese: 公益林的正外部性，導致“市場失靈”。

sentences.english: The car accident was laid to faulty brakes.
sentences.chinese: 車禍被歸咎於剎車失靈。

sentences.english: If a sudden turn Loader ZL50 Units failure.
sentences.chinese: 如一臺ZL50裝載機突然轉向失靈。

sentences.english: Every compartment had some minor breakage or malfunction to report .
sentences.chinese: 每間艙房總有些小毛病或機件失靈的事故上報。

sentences.english: Technicians determined the heater failure likely stemmed from a faulty switchbox and associated wiring.
sentences.chinese: 專家確定加熱器的故障可能是開關盒失靈及配線問題。

definition: (of a pendulum) to stop swinging/(of work, production, activities etc) to come to a halt/to be suspended/to be canceled/shutdown/(sports) lockout
lit. to have one's hands bound and be unable to do anything about it (idiom); fig. helpless in the face of a crisis
you can't guard against it (idiom)/impossible to defend effectively/not much one can do about it/It can't be prevented.
to be of no interest to anyone (idiom)
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
to misjudge/error of judgment/incorrect ruling/miscarriage of justice
to leave the rails/to derail/to jump the track
to cut short/to break off/to discontinue/to interrupt
frightening words to scare people (idiom); alarmist talk/reds under the beds
